trans-unit.source: Provides a cursor model for navigating and editing XML data.
trans-unit.target: 提供游標模型來巡覽及編輯 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace is an abstract class which defines a cursor model for navigating and editing XML information items as instances of the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>類別<xref:System.Xml.XPath?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空間是抽象類別會定義資料指標模型瀏覽及編輯 XML 資訊項目為 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 資料模型執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is created from a class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface such as the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>實作的類別，從建立物件<xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>這類介面<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects created by <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> objects are read-only while <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects created by <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> objects can be edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 所建立的物件<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>物件處於唯讀狀態時<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>所建立的物件<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>物件可以進行編輯。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object's read-only or editable status is determined using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件的唯讀或可編輯的狀態用來決定<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing XML data using the XPath data model, see the [Process XML Data Using the XPath Data Model](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何處理使用 XPath 資料模型的 XML 資料的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 XPath 資料模型處理 XML 資料](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions raised as a result of using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class, such as the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathException> class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 使用所引發的例外狀況<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>類別，例如<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathException>類別中，可能包含不應該公開受信任的案例中的機密資訊。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 使機密資訊不會出現在受信任的案例，就應該正確地處理例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class, you must override the following members:
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />類別，您必須覆寫下列成員：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別建構函式來初始化此類型中的狀態會呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在目前節點的子節點清單結尾建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object used to create one or more new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 物件，該物件可用來在目前節點的子節點清單結尾建立一或多個新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object used to create new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 物件，用來在目前節點的子節點清單結尾建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Appending child nodes adds the new nodes to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 將子節點附加至目前節點的子節點清單結尾加入新節點。

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the first appended node becomes the fourth child node.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當三個子節點存在的項目時，第一個附加的節點就會變成第四個子節點。

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The new child node is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: 新的子節點不會插入直到<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>稱為物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法時才有效唯一<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: You can write more than one node to the writer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以撰寫一個以上的節點至寫入器。

trans-unit.source: All nodes are appended to the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 所有的節點會附加至目前節點的子節點清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object returned from the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，新`pages`子項目會附加到的第一個子項目清單`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>從傳回的物件<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The current node the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is positioned on is not the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 所在的目前節點不是根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.source: The XML data string for the new child node.
trans-unit.target: 新的子節點之 XML 資料字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node using the XML data string specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 資料字串，在目前節點的子節點清單結尾建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 附加的子節點將新節點加入至目前節點的子節點清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當三個子節點存在的項目時，附加的節點就會變成第四個子節點。

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立新的項目節點，包含所有的 XML 語法中的 XML 字串參數。

trans-unit.source: The string for a new `book` node is `AppendChild("<book/>")`.
trans-unit.target: 新的字串`book`節點是`AppendChild("<book/>")`。

trans-unit.source: The string for appending the text "book" to the current node's text node is `AppendChild("book")`.
trans-unit.target: 將 「 書籍 」 的文字附加至目前節點的文字節點的字串是`AppendChild("book")`。

trans-unit.source: If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 字串包含多個節點，加入所有節點。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法時才有效唯一<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，會將新的 `pages` 項目子系附加至 `book` 檔案中第一個 `contosoBooks.xml` 項目的項目子系清單。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The XML data string parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: XML 資料字串參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current node the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is positioned on is not the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 所在的目前節點不是根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.source: The XML data string parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 資料字串參數的語式不正確。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object positioned on the XML data for the new child node.
trans-unit.target: 位於新的子節點之 XML 資料上的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node using the XML contents of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件的 XML 內容，在目前節點的子節點清單結尾建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 附加的子節點將新節點加入至目前節點的子節點清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當三個子節點存在的項目時，附加的節點就會變成第四個子節點。

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>物件位於 XML 節點的序列，會加入序列中的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法時才有效唯一<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，新`pages`子項目會附加到的第一個子項目清單`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new child element is appended using the same namespace as the XML document.
trans-unit.target: `http://www.contoso.com/books`指定命名空間，如此新的子項目會以 XML 文件使用相同的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object is in an error state or closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件處於錯誤狀態或已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件參數是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current node the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is positioned on is not the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 所在的目前節點不是根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.source: The XML contents of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件參數的 XML 內容語式不正確。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object positioned on the node to add as the new child node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件，位於要以新的子節點形式加入的節點上。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node using the nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 中指定的節點，在目前節點的子節點清單結尾建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 附加的子節點將新節點加入至目前節點的子節點清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當三個子節點存在的項目時，附加的節點就會變成第四個子節點。

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件位於 XML 節點的序列，會加入序列中的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法時才有效唯一<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the node contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，新`pages`子項目會附加到的第一個子項目清單`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用中所包含的節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定。

trans-unit.source: The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new child element is appended using the same namespace as the XML document.
trans-unit.target: `http://www.contoso.com/books`指定命名空間，如此新的子項目會以 XML 文件使用相同的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件參數是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current node the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is positioned on is not the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 所在的目前節點不是根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new child element node (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子項目節點的命名空間前置詞 (如有此項)。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the new child element node (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子項目節點的區域名稱 (如有此項)。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the new child element node (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子項目節點的命名空間 URI (如有此項)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> and <see langword="null" /> are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 和 <see langword="null" /> 相等。

trans-unit.source: The value of the new child element node.
trans-unit.target: 新的子項目節點的值。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> or <see langword="null" /> are passed, an empty element is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果已傳遞 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 或 <see langword="null" />，則會建立空的項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child element node at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node using the namespace prefix, local name and namespace URI specified with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用命名空間前置詞、區域名稱以及有指定值的指定命名空間 URI，在目前節點的子節點清單結尾建立新的子項目節點。

trans-unit.source: Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 附加的子節點將新節點加入至目前節點的子節點清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element node, the appended node becomes the fourth child node.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當項目節點的三個子節點存在，附加的節點會變成第四個子節點。

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間前置詞和 URI 值可以使用來取得<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>方法或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax appends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`:
trans-unit.target: 比方說，下列語法將附加的子元素所使用的範圍內的命名空間`xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`:

trans-unit.source: This creates the new child `<bk:pages/>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立新的子系`<bk:pages/>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChildElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChildElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的命名空間前置詞是`null`或<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>，則新項目的 URI 的命名空間的前置詞取自目前命名空間範圍內。

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有指派給指定的命名空間 URI 在目前範圍內沒有命名空間前置詞，會自動產生的命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChildElement%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChildElement%2A>方法時才有效唯一<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChildElement%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChildElement%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，會將新的 `pages` 項目子系附加至 `book` 檔案中第一個 `contosoBooks.xml` 項目的項目子系清單。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The current node the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is positioned on is not the root node or an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 所在的目前節點不是根節點或項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the base URI for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得目前節點的基底 (Base) URI。

trans-unit.source: The location from which the node was loaded, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if there is no value.
trans-unit.target: 節點載入的來源位置，如果沒有任何值，則為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data, aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms, and therefore contains nodes that come from different places.
trans-unit.target: 網路的 XML 文件的使用各種 W3C 標準包含機制，彙總的資料區塊組成，因此包含來自不同位置的節點。

trans-unit.source: DTD entities are an example of this aggregated data, but it is not limited to DTDs.
trans-unit.target: DTD 實體是範例，此彙總的資料，但不限於 Dtd。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.BaseURI%2A> property tells you where these nodes originate from.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.BaseURI%2A>屬性會告訴您這些節點是來自。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the XML data is loaded from http://server/mydata.xml, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.BaseURI%2A> property returns http://server/mydata.xml.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 XML 資料從載入http://server/mydata.xml、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.BaseURI%2A>屬性會傳回http://server/mydata.xml。

trans-unit.source: Nodes created using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class have the same <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.BaseURI%2A> as the XML document the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> was created from.
trans-unit.target: 使用所建立的節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>類別具有相同<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.BaseURI%2A>以 XML 文件<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>從已建立。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> can edit the underlying XML data.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 是否可以編輯基礎 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> can edit the underlying XML data; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 可以編輯基礎 XML 資料，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A> property has different values based on the three different implementations of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A>屬性具有不同的值根據三個不同的實作<xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>.NET Framework 中的介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A> values for <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects created by each implementation are listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A>值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>下表中列出的每個實作所建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> Implementation
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> 實作

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A> Value
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A> 值

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A> property to display the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A> values of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A>屬性來顯示<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A>值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>類別。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> containing the schemas used to validate the XML data contained in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />，包含用來驗證 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 中所含的 XML 資料之結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> that receives information about schema validation warnings and errors.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />，可接收與結構描述驗證的警告和錯誤有關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the XML data in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> conforms to the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema provided.
trans-unit.target: 請驗證 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 中的 XML 資料確實有符合所提供的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if no schema validation errors occurred; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未發生任何結構描述驗證錯誤，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CheckValidity%2A> method verifies that the XML data contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> conforms to a global type or declaration in the schema or schemas provided in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CheckValidity%2A>方法會驗證 XML 資料包含在<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>必須符合全域型別或結構描述或結構描述中所提供的宣告<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CheckValidity%2A> method does not perform infoset augmentation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CheckValidity%2A>方法不會執行資訊集增加。

trans-unit.source: This means that schema defaults are not applied, text values are not converted to atomic values, and no new type information is associated with information items.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，不會套用結構描述預設值、 文字值不會轉換成原子值，而且沒有新的型別資訊與相關聯的資訊項目。

trans-unit.source: Schema `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` hints in the XML data of are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`XML 資料中的提示都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a document node, the validation process includes checking of uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於文件節點上，驗證程序包括檢查唯一性和參考條件約束 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，和`xs:unique`)。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, these checks are omitted.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會省略這些檢查。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> passed as a parameter is `null` and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node, the type information exposed by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property's <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A> property is used to check the node's validity.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>參數形式傳遞`null`和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於項目節點，所公開的型別資訊<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A>屬性用來檢查節點的有效性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> passed as a parameter is `null` and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the root node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of the document element (that is, the element child of the root node) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>參數形式傳遞`null`和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於根節點，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A>使用文件項目 （也就是項目子系的根節點） 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In both cases if the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A> property of the element's <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property is `null` and the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> passed as a parameter is `null`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown because there is no type information to use to perform validation.
trans-unit.target: 在這兩種情況下如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A>屬性的項目<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A>屬性是`null`和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>參數形式傳遞`null`、<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>會擲回因為用來執行任何類型資訊驗證。

trans-unit.source: A schema validation error occurred, and no <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> was specified to handle validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 已發生結構描述驗證錯誤，而且未指定任何 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> 來處理驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is positioned on a node that is not an element, attribute, or the root node or there is not type information to perform validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 所在的節點並不是項目、屬性或根節點，或是沒有任何型別資訊可執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CheckValidity(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet,System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler)" /> method was called with an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> parameter when the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> was not positioned on the root node of the XML data.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CheckValidity(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet,System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler)" /> 不在 XML 資料的根節點上時，使用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 參數呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> positioned at the same node as this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請在與這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 相同的節點上建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> positioned at the same node as this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 位於相同節點的新 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method is especially useful in conjunction with the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A>方法會很實用搭配<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> is used to iterate over a selected node set, and contains a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> property which returns an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> positioned on the context node of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>用來選取的節點集反覆查看，並包含<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>所在的內容節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> property cannot be used to move away from the node set.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>傳回<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>屬性不能用來將移開節點集。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you clone the returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> and use the cloned navigator to do any additional moves.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，複製傳回<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>和使用複製的導覽器 執行任何額外的移動。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not affected by subsequent changes to the original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不會受到後續變更原始<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets all book titles authored by Herman Melville.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取得 Herman Melville 所撰寫的所有書名。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to compare against.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares the position of the current <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> with the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 比較目前 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置與指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder" /> value representing the comparative position of the two <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder" /> 值，表示兩個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件的比較位置。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: XmlNodeOrder
trans-unit.target: XmlNodeOrder

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The current node of this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is before the current node of the supplied <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>之前所提供的目前節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: The current node of this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is after the current node of the supplied <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>之後所提供的目前節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: The two <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects are positioned on the same node.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件位於相同節點上。

trans-unit.source: The node positions cannot be determined relative to each other in the document order, or `null` is specified as the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 節點位置無法決定相對於其他文件順序或`null`指定為<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>參數。

trans-unit.source: This could occur if the two nodes reside in different trees.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個節點位於不同的樹狀結構中，就會發生這種情況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A> method's behavior is dependent on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is currently positioned on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A>方法的行為會視<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType><xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>目前所在。

trans-unit.source: When comparing nodes in the XML document, the following rules apply:
trans-unit.target: 當比較 XML 文件中的節點時，適用下列規則：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> nodes: These nodes are returned in document order from the source document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> 節點： 這些節點會傳回文件順序，將來源文件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace> nodes: These nodes may be returned in document order and are always before the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> nodes of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace> 節點： 這些節點可能會傳回文件順序，而且一律先<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute>父項目的節點。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> nodes: These nodes may be returned in document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> 節點： 這些節點可能會傳回文件順序。

trans-unit.source: They always come after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace> nodes and before any child nodes of the parent node.
trans-unit.target: 一律後面出現<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace>節點、 父節點的任何子節點之前。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the XPath data model and details about each of the node types, see section 5 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 為 XPath 資料模型的詳細資訊，以及每個節點類型的詳細資料，請參閱 W3C XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 之建議事項第 5 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法沒有任何作用狀態的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.IsSamePosition%2A> method rather than the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A> method when possible.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.IsSamePosition%2A>方法而非<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A>盡可能的方法。

trans-unit.source: A string representing an XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XPath 運算式的字串。

trans-unit.source: Compiles a string representing an XPath expression and returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 編譯表示 XPath 運算式的字串，並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" /> object representing the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XPath 運算式的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An XPath expression is evaluated to yield one of the following return types:
trans-unit.target: XPath 運算式會評估得出下列一種傳回類型：

trans-unit.source: Node Set: an unordered collection of nodes without duplicates
trans-unit.target: 節點集： 排序之的集合的不重複的節點

trans-unit.source: Boolean: `true` or `false`
trans-unit.target: 布林值：`true`或 `false`

trans-unit.source: Number: a floating-point number
trans-unit.target: 浮點數的數字：

trans-unit.source: String: a sequence of UCS characters
trans-unit.target: 字串： UCS 字元的順序

trans-unit.source: Expressions that return a node set can be used in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Evaluate%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 傳回節點集的運算式可用於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Evaluate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Expressions that return a Boolean, number, or string can be used in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Evaluate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值、 數字或字串的運算式可用於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Evaluate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The rules on valid expressions for the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A> method are specific to that method.
trans-unit.target: 有效的運算式上的規則<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A>方法專屬於該方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="xpath" /> parameter contains an XPath expression that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="xpath" /> 參數包含無效的 XPath 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: XPath 運算式無效。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new attribute node (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新屬性節點的命名空間前置詞 (如有此項)。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the new attribute node which cannot <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 不能為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 或 <see langword="null" /> 的新屬性節點的區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI for the new attribute node (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新屬性節點的命名空間 URI (如有此項)。

trans-unit.source: The value of the new attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 新屬性節點的值。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> or <see langword="null" /> are passed, an empty attribute node is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果已傳遞 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 或 <see langword="null" />，則會建立空的屬性節點。

trans-unit.source: Creates an attribute node on the current element node using the namespace prefix, local name and namespace URI specified with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用命名空間前置詞、區域名稱以及有指定值的指定命名空間 URI，在目前的項目節點上建立屬性節點。

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間前置詞和 URI 值可透過使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax creates an attribute by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列語法會建立的屬性使用範圍內的命名空間`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:

trans-unit.source: This creates the new attribute `<bk:element attributeName="text"/>` on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立新屬性`<bk:element attributeName="text"/>`上目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the namespace prefix specified is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的命名空間前置詞是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>或`null`，命名空間 URI 的新屬性的前置詞取自目前命名空間範圍內。

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有指派給指定的命名空間 URI 在目前範圍內沒有命名空間前置詞，會自動產生的命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters.
trans-unit.target: 例如若要建立新屬性的預設命名空間中的項目上`contosoBooks.xml`檔案 (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`)，您指定`null`或<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空間前置詞和命名空間 URI 參數。

trans-unit.source: Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A> method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute.
trans-unit.target: 指定`http://www.contoso.com/books`做為命名空間 URI 參數將會造成<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A>方法，以自動產生新屬性的命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 建立新屬性是與命名空間宣告項目可能衝突，因為另一個命名空間宣告，在相同範圍中，使用選擇的命名空間前置詞的命名空間節點，或因為選擇的前置詞的相同項目，但是繫結至不同的命名空間 URI，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a new `discount` attribute is created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，新`discount`上建立屬性`price`的第一個子項目`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不位於項目節點上。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object used to create new attributes on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 物件，此物件是用來在目前的項目上建立新的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object used to create new attributes on the current element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 物件，此物件是用來在目前的項目上建立新的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttributes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, the new attributes created by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> method are placed at the end of the attribute list of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於項目時，所建立的新屬性上<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>方法會放置在目前的項目之屬性清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The new attributes are not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: 新的屬性則不會插入直到<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>稱為物件。

trans-unit.source: If the namespace prefix specified is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的命名空間前置詞是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>或`null`，命名空間 URI 的新屬性的前置詞取自目前命名空間範圍內。

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有指派給指定的命名空間 URI 在目前範圍內沒有命名空間前置詞，會自動產生的命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters.
trans-unit.target: 例如若要建立新屬性的預設命名空間中的項目上`contosoBooks.xml`檔案 (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`)，您指定`null`或<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空間前置詞和命名空間 URI 參數。

trans-unit.source: Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A> method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute.
trans-unit.target: 指定`http://www.contoso.com/books`做為命名空間 URI 參數將會造成<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttribute%2A>方法，以自動產生新屬性的命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 建立新屬性是與命名空間宣告項目可能衝突，因為另一個命名空間宣告，在相同範圍中，使用選擇的命名空間前置詞的命名空間節點，或因為選擇的前置詞的相同項目，但是繫結至不同的命名空間 URI，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object returned may only be used to create attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>傳回的物件可能只用於建立屬性。

trans-unit.source: Calling other <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object methods that do not create attributes throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫其他<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>不建立屬性的物件方法會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttributes%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttributes%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, new `discount` and `currency` attributes are created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object returned from the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，會使用從 `discount` 方法傳回的 `currency` 物件，在 `price` 檔案中第一個 `book` 項目的 `contosoBooks.xml` 項目子系上，建立新的 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> 及 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CreateAttributes%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不位於項目節點上。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的複本。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> copy of this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 複本。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> positioned on the last sibling node in the range to delete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />，位於要刪除的範圍內的最後一個同層級節點上。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a range of sibling nodes from the current node to the node specified.
trans-unit.target: 刪除從目前節點到指定節點的某範圍之同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteRange%2A> method deletes a range of sibling nodes from the current node the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on (inclusive) to the node specified by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> parameter (inclusive).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteRange%2A>方法會刪除從目前節點的某範圍之同層級節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於 （含） 到所指定的節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>（含） 的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is then positioned on its parent node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>然後位於其父節點。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the first and second `book` elements of the `contosoBooks.xml` file are deleted using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，第一個和第二個`book`的項目`contosoBooks.xml`使用刪除檔案<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> specified is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.source: The last node to delete specified is not a valid sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 所指定要刪除的最後一個節點不是目前節點的有效同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 刪除目前的節點和它的子節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the deleted node's parent node on successful deletion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於上成功刪除已刪除的節點的父節點上。

trans-unit.source: If the deleted node is a text node which is the content of a simple typed element, the element loses its type information.
trans-unit.target: 如果刪除的節點是文字節點內容的簡單型別項目，項目會失去其類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This means that when positioned on the element the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.TypedValue%2A> properties have the values `null`, <xref:System.String> and <xref:System.String.Empty> respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這表示當項目上放置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.XmlType%2A>，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.TypedValue%2A>屬性有值`null`，<xref:System.String>和<xref:System.String.Empty>分別。

trans-unit.source: Deleted nodes are still accessible to <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects positioned over them prior to deletion.
trans-unit.target: 已刪除的節點都仍可存取<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於它們在刪除前的物件。

trans-unit.source: However methods that attempt to move away from the deleted sub-tree fail.
trans-unit.target: 不過，嘗試將移開刪除的樹狀子目錄方法都會失敗。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> methods always fail when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned over the top most deleted node.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>方法一律會失敗<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於最已刪除的最上層節點。

trans-unit.source: This is because the deleted node is no longer connected to the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為已刪除的節點無法再連接至 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Similarly the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> method always fails if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the bottom-most deleted node.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>方法一律會失敗如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於最下方的已刪除節點上。

trans-unit.source: In the following example the `price` element of the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file is deleted using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中`price`的第一個項目`book`元素`contosoBooks.xml`使用刪除檔案<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object after the `price` element is deleted is on the parent `book` element.
trans-unit.target: 刪除 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 項目之後，`price` 物件的位置在父 `book` 項目上。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is positioned on a node that cannot be deleted such as the root node or a namespace node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 位於無法刪除的節點上，例如根節點或命名空間節點等。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the specified XPath expression and returns the typed result.
trans-unit.target: 評估指定的 XPath 運算式，並傳回具類型的結果。

trans-unit.source: A string representing an XPath expression that can be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示能接受評估的 XPath 運算式。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the specified XPath expression and returns the typed result.

trans-unit.source: The expression is evaluated using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> node of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> as the context node.
trans-unit.target: 使用評估運算式<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>的內容節點。

trans-unit.source: If `context` is `null`, the node on which the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is currently positioned is used as the context node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`context`是`null`，所在節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於目前使用的內容節點。

trans-unit.source: The position() and last() functions, unless used as a predicate in a location step, always return 0 under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: Position （） 和 last （） 函式，除非用做位置步驟中，在述詞會一律傳回 0，在下列情況下：

trans-unit.source: The `context` argument is `null`.
trans-unit.target: `context` 引數為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> has not been called on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> 尚未呼叫上<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>。

trans-unit.source: Because the position() and last() functions work on the current node, you should not use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> property to move away from the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: 在目前節點中工作的 position （） 和 last （） 函式，因為您不應該使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>屬性，以將移開選定的節點集。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the value of the specified attribute; <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if a matching attribute is not found, or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含指定屬性的值；如果找不到符合的屬性，或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 不在項目節點上，則為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> must be positioned on an element node before calling the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.GetAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>必須定位在項目節點，然後再呼叫上<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.GetAttribute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法沒有任何作用狀態的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.target: 命名空間節點的區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the namespace node corresponding to the specified local name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回對應至指定區域名稱之命名空間節點的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the value of the namespace node; <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if a matching namespace node is not found, or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含命名空間節點的值；如果找不到符合的命名空間節點，或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 不在項目節點上，則為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />。

trans-unit.source: Namespaces `xml` and `xmlns` always return a value.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間`xml`和`xmlns`一律傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is specified as the `name` parameter, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.GetNamespace%2A> method returns the default `xmlns` namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定為`name`參數，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.GetNamespace%2A>方法會傳回預設`xmlns`命名空間。

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 如需定義的命名空間節點，請參閱 W3C XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 之建議事項的 5.4 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。

trans-unit.source: This method does not affect the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope" /> 值，指定要傳回的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Returns the in-scope namespaces of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前節點範圍中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> collection of namespace names keyed by prefix.
trans-unit.target: 以前置詞當做索引鍵的命名空間名稱之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The namespaces returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope> value specified.
trans-unit.target: 取決於命名空間傳回<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope>指定值。

trans-unit.source: XmlNamespaceScope Value
trans-unit.target: XmlNamespaceScope Value

trans-unit.source: Namespaces Returned
trans-unit.target: 傳回的命名空間

trans-unit.source: All namespaces defined in the scope of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在目前節點範圍中定義的所有命名空間，

trans-unit.source: This includes the `xmlns:xml` namespace, which is always declared implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 這包括`xmlns:xml`一律以隱含方式宣告命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The order of the namespaces returned is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間傳回的順序並無定義。

trans-unit.source: All namespaces defined in the scope of the current node, excluding the `xmlns:xml` namespace, which is always declared implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在目前節點的範圍中定義的所有命名空間不含`xmlns:xml`一律以隱含方式宣告命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The order of the namespaces returned is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間傳回的順序並無定義。

trans-unit.source: All namespaces that are defined locally at the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在目前節點上本機定義的所有命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current node has any attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示目前節點是否具有任何屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the current node has attributes; returns <see langword="false" /> if the current node has no attributes, or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的節點有屬性，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />；如果目前的節點沒有屬性，或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不在項目節點上，則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current node has any child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的節點是否有任何子節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current node has any child nodes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的節點有任何子節點，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a node that cannot have child nodes, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.HasChildren%2A> property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>置於不能有子節點的節點上<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.HasChildren%2A>屬性一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element><xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>，或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>節點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the markup of the child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含目前節點之子節點的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InnerXml%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.OuterXml%2A> properties are not very efficient.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InnerXml%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.OuterXml%2A>屬性不是非常有效率。

trans-unit.source: If performance is a priority, it is more efficient to use the node navigation methods of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> to get values of child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果效能是優先順序，則使用節點巡覽方法更有效率<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>取得子節點的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InnerXml%2A> property to display the contents of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file and its child nodes in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InnerXml%2A>屬性來顯示內容的第一個`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案及其子節點中的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InnerXml" /> property cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InnerXml" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node after the currently selected node.
trans-unit.target: 在目前選取的節點之後建立新的同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object used to create a new sibling node after the currently selected node.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 物件，此物件用來在目前選取的節點之後建立新的同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> object used to create a new sibling node after the currently selected node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 物件，用來在目前選取的節點之後建立新的同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertAfter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertAfter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The new sibling node is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: 新的同層級節點不會插入直到<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>稱為物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertAfter%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertAfter%2A>方法時才有效唯一<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>定位於項目、 文字、 處理指示或註解節點上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertAfter%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertAfter%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example a new `pages` element is inserted after the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertAfter%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node after the currently selected node using the XML string specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 字串，在目前選取的節點之後建立新的同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立新的項目節點，包含所有的 XML 語法中的 XML 字串參數。

trans-unit.source: The string for a new `book` node is `InsertAfter("<book/>")`.
trans-unit.target: 新的字串`book`節點是`InsertAfter("<book/>")`。

trans-unit.source: The string for inserting the text "book" after the current node's text node is `InsertAfter("book")`.
trans-unit.target: 目前節點的文字節點後插入的文字 「 書籍 」 字串`InsertAfter("book")`。

trans-unit.source: If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 字串包含多個節點，加入所有節點。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertBefore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertBefore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>物件位於 XML 節點的序列，會加入序列中的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertBefore%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertBefore%2A>方法時才有效唯一<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>定位於項目、 文字、 處理指示或註解節點上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertBefore%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertBefore%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example a new `pages` element is inserted before the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中新`pages`項目之前插入`price`的第一個子項目`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new sibling element is inserted using the same namespace as the XML document.
trans-unit.target: `http://www.contoso.com/books`指定命名空間，如此新的同層級項目插入使用相同的命名空間的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object is in an error state or closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件處於錯誤狀態或已關閉。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件參數是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted before the current node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置不得為插入目前節點前面的新同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不支援編輯。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件參數的 XML 內容語式不正確。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object positioned on the node to add as the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件，位於要以新的同層級節點形式加入的節點上。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node before the currently selected node using the nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 中的節點，在目前選取的節點之前建立新的同層級節點。

trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertBefore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件位於 XML 節點的序列，會加入序列中的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertBefore%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertBefore%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example a new `pages` element is inserted before the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the node contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中新`pages`項目之前插入`price`的第一個子項目`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用中所包含的節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new sibling element is inserted using the same namespace as the XML document.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted before the current node.

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子項目的命名空間前置詞 (如有此項)。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子項目的本機名稱 (如有此項)。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子項目的命名空間 URI (如有此項)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> and <see langword="null" /> are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 和 <see langword="null" /> 相等。

trans-unit.source: The value of the new child element.
trans-unit.target: 新的子項目的值。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> or <see langword="null" /> are passed, an empty element is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果已傳遞 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 或 <see langword="null" />，則會建立空的項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling element after the current node using the namespace prefix, local name and namespace URI specified, with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用命名空間前置詞、區域名稱以及有指定值的指定命名空間 URI，在目前的節點之後建立新的同層級項目。

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間前置詞和 URI 值可透過使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax inserts a sibling element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列語法使用範圍內的命名空間中插入同層級項目`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:

trans-unit.source: This creates the new sibling `<bk:pages/>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立新的同層級`<bk:pages/>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementAfter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementAfter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的命名空間前置詞是`null`或<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>，則新項目的 URI 的命名空間的前置詞取自目前命名空間範圍內。

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有指派給指定的命名空間 URI 在目前範圍內沒有命名空間前置詞，會自動產生的命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementAfter%2A> method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementAfter%2A>方法時才有效唯一<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>定位於項目、 文字、 處理指示或註解節點上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementAfter%2A> method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementAfter%2A>方法不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。
