trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is a descendant of the current <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 是否為目前 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的子代 (Descendant)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is a descendant of the current <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 是目前 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的子代，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is a descendant of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> if it is positioned on a descendant node of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>是目前的下階<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>它位於目前的子系節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: Take, for example, the following XML string:
trans-unit.target: 例如，採取下列 XML 字串：

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `item` node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is positioned on the `name` node, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.IsDescendant%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於`item` 節點，而<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定位於`name` 節點，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.IsDescendant%2A>傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回`false`下列條件：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation but points at a different document instance than the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定的共用相同的實作，但是指向不同的文件執行個體與目前的巡覽器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified has a different implementation than the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定具有比目前的巡覽器不同的實作。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current node is an empty element without an end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值，指出目前的節點是否為空項目，且沒有結尾項目標記。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current node is an empty element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的節點為空項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the difference between the following different elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您判斷下列不同的項目之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: IsEmptyElement Value
trans-unit.target: IsEmptyElement 值

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating if the current node represents an XPath node.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的節點是否表示 XPath 節點。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to compare to this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: 要和此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is at the same position as the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請判斷目前的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 是否和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 位在相同的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> objects have the same position; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件的位置相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.IsSamePosition%2A> method assumes that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation and is points at the same document instance as the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.IsSamePosition%2A>方法會假設<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定共用相同的實作，而且是指向相同的文件執行個體目前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回`false`下列條件：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation but points at a different document instance than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定的共用相同的實作，但是指向不同的文件執行個體與目前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has a different implementation than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>具有不同的實作與目前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name" /> of the current node without any namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得目前節點的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name" />，而不含任何命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the local name of the current node, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the current node does not have a name (for example, text or comment nodes).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含目前節點的區域名稱；如果目前節點沒有名稱 (例如文字或註解節點)，則為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The local name returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的本機名稱，取決於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>目前節點。

trans-unit.source: For example, the local name for the `<bk:book>` element is `book`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，本機名稱`<bk:book>`項目是`book`。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the value returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A> property, based on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出所傳回的值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>屬性，根據<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>目前節點。

trans-unit.source: XPathNodeType
trans-unit.target: XPathNodeType

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The prefix associated with the namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的命名空間 URI 的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The target of the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: 處理指示的目標。

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes
trans-unit.target: 所有其他<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>節點

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates over the node tree recursively, and displays information about <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會逐一查看節點樹狀目錄中以遞迴方式，並顯示相關資訊<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>節點。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The prefix whose namespace URI you want to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 您要解析其命名空間 URI 的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: To match the default namespace, pass <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要符合預設命名空間，請傳遞 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace URI for the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定前置詞的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the namespace URI assigned to the namespace prefix specified; <see langword="null" /> if no namespace URI is assigned to the prefix specified.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含指派給指定命名空間前置詞的命名空間 URI；如果沒有命名空間 URI 指派給指定的前置詞，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> returned is atomized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 已原子化。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is specified as the `prefix` parameter, the currently assigned default namespace URI is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定為`prefix`參數、 URI 會傳回目前指派的預設命名空間。

trans-unit.source: If no default namespace URI is explicitly assigned, and <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is specified as the `prefix` parameter, the blank prefix is associated with elements that are not in any namespace, and <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有預設命名空間 URI 明確指派，和<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定為`prefix`參數，空白前置詞是與不在任何命名空間中的項目相關聯和<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The prefix to namespace URI mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI 對應的前置詞可以變更 XML 文件中的節點之間。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method may not be consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>方法可能不一致從一個節點的下一步。

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementAfter%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementBefore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementAfter%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.InsertElementBefore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to resolve for the prefix.
trans-unit.target: 用來解析前置詞的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the prefix declared for the specified namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 取得為指定命名空間 URI 宣告的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the namespace prefix assigned to the namespace URI specified; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if no prefix is assigned to the namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含指派給指定之命名空間 URI 的命名空間前置詞；如果沒有指派前置詞給指定的命名空間 URI，則為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> returned is atomized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 已原子化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> method returns the first prefix that matches the namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>方法會傳回第一個符合指定命名空間 URI 的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Multiple prefixes referring to the same namespace URI are not ordered in any particular way, so a particular prefix may not be returned each time when more than one is assigned.
trans-unit.target: 多個參考相同的命名空間的前置詞的 URI 不會排序以任何特定的方式，讓特定的前置詞可能不會傳回每次當多個指派。

trans-unit.source: Namespace URI to prefix mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 前置詞對應的命名空間 URI 可以變更 XML 文件中的節點之間。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> method may not be consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>方法可能不一致從一個節點的下一步。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node matches the specified <see cref="N:System.Xml.XPath" /> expression.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的節點是否符合指定的 <see cref="N:System.Xml.XPath" /> 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 運算式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node matches the specified XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的節點是否符合指定的 XPath 運算式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current node matches the specified XPath expression; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的節點符合指定的 XPath 運算式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method has no affect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法沒有任何作用狀態的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression cannot be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 無法評估 XPath 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: XPath 運算式無效。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" /> object containing the compiled XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" /> 物件，包含已編譯的 XPath 運算式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node matches the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的節點是否符合指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current node matches the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前節點符合 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法沒有任何作用狀態的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, except that a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> object containing the compiled XPath expression is specified, rather than an XPath expression <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，不同處在於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>物件包含已編譯的 XPath 運算式指定，而不是 XPath 運算式<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the titles of all novels.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示所有小說的標題。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file, `books.xml`, as input.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用該檔案，`books.xml`作為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression cannot be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 無法評估 XPath 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: XPath 運算式無效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> positioned on the node that you want to move to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />，位於要移至的節點上。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the same position as the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至與指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 相同的位置上。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the same position as the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移到與指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 相同的位置上，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `true` if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> that shares the same implementation and points at the same document instance as the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回`true`如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>共用相同的實作和指向相同的文件執行個體與目前的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> that has a different implementation than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回`false`如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>具有不同的實作與目前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the attribute; <see langword="null" /> for an empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性的命名空間 URI；空的命名空間則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the attribute with the matching local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至具有相符的區域名稱和命名空間 URI 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the attribute; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至此屬性，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不目前所在的項目，這個方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: After a successful call to <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToAttribute%2A>, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> properties reflect the values of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在成功呼叫之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToAttribute%2A>、 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A>屬性會反映屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>屬性，方法位於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不適用。

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the navigator.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法一律會傳回`false`，不會變更導覽所在位置。

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> to move to the next attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>移至下一個屬性節點。

trans-unit.source: Once positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: 一旦定位在屬性上，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>移至擁有者項目。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the child node specified.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移到指定的子節點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要移向的子節點之 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the child node of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移到指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> 的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the child node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至此子節點，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToChild%2A> method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToChild%2A>方法取決於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>目前的節點，而<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>移到子節點。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes, and the child nodes they can move to.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示不同<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>節點及它們可以將它移到子節點。

trans-unit.source: Current Node's XPathNodeType
trans-unit.target: 目前節點的 XPathNodeType

trans-unit.source: Child Node's XPathNodeType
trans-unit.target: 子節點 XPathNodeType

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> 或 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> 或 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>。

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> values
trans-unit.target: 所有其他<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>值

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 無。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要移向的子節點之區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要移向的子節點之命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the child node with the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移到具有指定區域名稱和命名空間 URI 的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the child node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至此子節點，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToChild%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToChild%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.AppendChild%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the first sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至目前節點的第一個同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the first sibling node of the current node; <see langword="false" /> if there is no first sibling, or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至目前節點的第一個同層級節點，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />；如果沒有第一個同層級節點，或是 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 目前位在屬性節點上，則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is already positioned on the first sibling, <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> will return <see langword="true" /> and will not move its position.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 已經在第一個同層級位置，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 將會傳回 <see langword="true" />，且不會移動其位置。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="M:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst" /> returns <see langword="false" /> because there is no first sibling, or if <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is currently positioned on an attribute, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果因為沒有第一個同層級而使 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst" /> 傳回 <see langword="false" />，或是 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 目前位在屬性上，則 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置不會變更。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the first attribute of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，移動 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 至目前節點的第一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the first attribute of the current node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至目前節點的第一個屬性，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不目前所在的項目，這個方法會傳回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不會變更。

trans-unit.source: After a successful call to <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstAttribute%2A>, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> properties reflect the values of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在成功呼叫之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstAttribute%2A>、 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A>屬性會反映屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>屬性，方法位於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不適用。

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法一律會傳回`false`，不會變更的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> to move to the next attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>移至下一個屬性節點。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位在屬性上，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>移至擁有者項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> methods to display all the attributes for each book in the `books.xml` file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>通訊錄的每個顯示的所有屬性的方法`books.xml`檔案。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the first child node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至目前節點的第一個子節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the first child node of the current node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至目前節點的第一個子節點，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element> are the only two <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> values that can have children.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Root> 和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>都只有兩個<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>可以有子系的值。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` for all other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node types.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回`false`對於其他所有<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>節點型別。

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstChild%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstChild%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the first namespace node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至目前節點的第一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to first namespace node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至目前節點的第一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the first namespace node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至第一個命名空間節點，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 類別會以反向的文件順序傳回命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstNamespace%2A> essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstNamespace%2A> 實際上會移至目前範圍中的最後一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>已移至命名空間節點，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>屬性會反映的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>命名空間節點，方法位於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不適用。

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法一律會傳回`false`，不會變更的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>移至下一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於命名空間節點上，呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>將移回至項目節點。

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 如需定義的命名空間節點，請參閱 W3C XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 之建議事項的 5.4 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> value describing the namespace scope.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> 值，說明命名空間的範圍。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the first namespace node that matches the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至符合指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> 的第一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the first namespace node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至第一個命名空間節點，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 類別會以反向的文件順序傳回命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstNamespace%2A> essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstNamespace%2A> 實際上會移至目前範圍中的最後一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Using the following XML fragment as an example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `data` node, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstNamespace%2A> behaves in the following manner.
trans-unit.target: 使用下列 XML 片段為例，如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於`data` 節點，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstNamespace%2A>以下列方式運作。

trans-unit.source: `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, or `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`.
trans-unit.target: `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` 移至下列命名空間節點的其中一個： `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`， `xmlns:b='B'`，或`xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`。

trans-unit.source: `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, or `xmlns:b='B'`.
trans-unit.target: `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` 移至下列命名空間節點的其中一個： `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`，或`xmlns:b='B'`。

trans-unit.source: `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` moves to the `xmlns:c='C'` node.
trans-unit.target: `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` 移至`xmlns:c='C'`節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不目前所在的項目，這個方法會傳回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不會變更。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>已移至命名空間節點，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>屬性會反映的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>命名空間節點，方法位於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不適用。

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法一律會傳回`false`，不會變更的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>移至下一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於命名空間節點上，呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>將移回至項目節點。

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 如需定義的命名空間節點，請參閱 W3C XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 之建議事項的 5.4 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the specified element in document order.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至文件順序中指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> cannot be <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute" /> or <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> 不能是 <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the following element of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> specified in document order.
trans-unit.target: 會根據文件順序，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至下列指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> moved successfully; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移動則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method does not move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法不會移動到屬性或命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> parameter value is <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace>, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>參數值是<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法會傳回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>保持不變。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法會傳回`false`，位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>保持不變。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the following `bookstore` element.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>移動的根目錄`contosoBooks.xml`檔案下的`bookstore`項目。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the element with the local name and namespace URI specified in document order.
trans-unit.target: 會根據文件順序，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移到具有指定區域名稱和命名空間 URI 的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> moved successfully; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移動則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法會傳回`false`，位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>保持不變。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the first `price` element.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>移動的根目錄`contosoBooks.xml`第一個檔案`price`項目。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> cannot be <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute" /> or <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> 不能是 <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object positioned on the element boundary which the current <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> will not move past while searching for the following element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件所在的項目界限，目前的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 在搜尋下列項目時，將不會超出這個界限。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the following element of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> specified, to the boundary specified, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 會根據文件順序，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至下列指定界限之指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> moved successfully; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移動則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method does not move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法不會移動到屬性或命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> parameter value is <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace>, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>參數值是<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Attribute>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Namespace>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法會傳回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>保持不變。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>界限做為參數傳遞不位於目前的位置之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>則會忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is `null` the next following node with the specified <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> is located in document order.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>做為參數傳遞的界限是`null`下一步 以指定下列節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>位於文件順序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法無法用來將移到屬性或命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>傳遞參數是否位於屬性或命名空間節點上的界限，它相當於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>界限參數具有已位於其父項目的第一個子節點。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如此可確保屬性或命名空間節點的父項目，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於界限參數上，可以比對這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法會傳回`false`，位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>保持不變。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the following `price` element.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>移動的根目錄`contosoBooks.xml`檔案下的`price`項目。

trans-unit.source: A clone of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is made using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 複製品<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件則會使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, positioned on the `price` element, will be used as a boundary.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>、 位於`price`項目，將作為界限。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the position of the cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> do not affect the original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的位置變更<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不會影響原始<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: The original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved back to the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 原始<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>會移回至根目錄的`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToRoot%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The title and first and last name of the author are retrieved using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method and an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: 第一個和最後一個名稱作者與標題會使用擷取<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method will return true until the `price` element boundary is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法會傳回 true，直到`price`項目界限為止。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object positioned on the element boundary which the current <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> will not move past while searching for the following element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件所在的項目界限，目前的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 在搜尋下列項目時，將不會超出這個界限。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the element with the local name and namespace URI specified, to the boundary specified, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 會根據文件順序，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移到指定界限之區域名稱和指定命名空間 URI 的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> moved successfully; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移動則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>界限做為參數傳遞不位於目前的位置之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>則會忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is `null`, the following element with the local name and namespace URI specified is located in document order.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>界限參數是`null`，具有區域名稱和命名空間 URI，指定下列項目位於文件順序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法無法用來將移到屬性或命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>傳遞參數是否位於屬性或命名空間節點上的界限，它相當於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>界限參數具有已位於其父項目的第一個子節點。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如此可確保屬性或命名空間節點的父項目，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於界限參數上，可以比對這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>方法會傳回`false`，位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>保持不變。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the following `book` element.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>移動的根目錄`contosoBooks.xml`檔案下的`book`項目。

trans-unit.source: A clone of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is made using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method and is moved from the `book` element to the following `first-name` element.
trans-unit.target: 複製品<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件則會使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A>方法以及從移`book`下的項目`first-name`項目。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, positioned on the `first-name` element, will be used as a boundary.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>、 位於`first-name`項目，將作為界限。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the position of the cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> do not affect the original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的位置變更<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不會影響原始<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: The original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> then attempts to move to the following `price` element using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method with the boundary passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 原始<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>嘗試移動下列`price`項目使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>與界限的方法做為參數傳遞。

trans-unit.source: This move fails because the following `price` element is beyond the boundary.
trans-unit.target: 此移動將會失敗，因為下列`price`項目超出界限。

trans-unit.source: The original <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> then attempts to move to the following `title` element which is before the boundary using the same method and succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 原始<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>嘗試移動下列`title`其之前的界限使用的相同方式，並成功的項目。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the <c>ID</c> value of the node to which you want to move.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 表示要移向之節點的 <c>ID</c> 值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves to the node that has an attribute of type <c>ID</c> whose value matches the specified <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，移至具有類型 <c>ID</c> 的屬性之節點 (此類型的值符合指定的 <see cref="T:System.String" />)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移動，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the navigator is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="false" />，則不會變更巡覽器的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to identify nodes by unique `ID` provided the source document explicitly declares attributes of type `ID` using a DTD.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來識別節點的唯一`ID`提供來源文件明確宣告型別的屬性`ID`使用 DTD。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the following XML data, `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`, was loaded using a DTD that included the following: `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設下列的 XML 資料， `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`，已載入使用 DTD 包含下列： `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> was positioned somewhere in the XML data, calling `MoveToId("a1")` positions the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> on the element node `x`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>已在 XML 資料之後，呼叫中的某處置放`MoveToId("a1")`位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>項目節點上`x`。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間節點的命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the namespace node with the specified namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至具有指定命名空間前置詞的命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the specified namespace; <see langword="false" /> if a matching namespace node was not found, or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至指定的命名空間，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果找不到相符的命名空間節點，或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 不在項目節點上，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>已移至命名空間節點，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>屬性會反映的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>命名空間節點，方法位於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不適用。

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法一律會傳回`false`，不會變更的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>移至下一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於命名空間節點上，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>將移回至項目節點。

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 如需定義的命名空間節點，請參閱 W3C XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 之建議事項的 5.4 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至目前節點的下一個同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至目前節點的下一個同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next sibling node; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if there are no more siblings or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至下一個同層級節點，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果沒有其他的同層級節點，或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 目前位在屬性節點上，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates over the node tree recursively, and displays information about element and text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會逐一查看節點樹狀目錄中以遞迴方式，並顯示項目和文字節點的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> of the sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要移向的同層級節點之 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next sibling node of the current node that matches the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至目前節點中符合指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> 的下一個同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next sibling node; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if there are no more siblings or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至下一個同層級節點，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果沒有其他的同層級節點，或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 目前位在屬性節點上，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>方法取決於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>目前節點和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>移至的下一個同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes and the sibling nodes they can move to.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示不同<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>節點，而且它們可以將它移到同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: Current Node's XPathNodeType
trans-unit.target: 目前節點的 XPathNodeType

trans-unit.source: Sibling Node's XPathNodeType
trans-unit.target: 同層級節點 XPathNodeType

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> 或 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> 或 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> 或 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Element>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.ProcessingInstruction>、<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Comment> 或 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text>。

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> values
trans-unit.target: 所有其他<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>值

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 無。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要移向的下一個同層級節點之區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要移向的下一個同層級節點之命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next sibling node with the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移到具有指定區域名稱和命名空間 URI 的下一個同層級節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next sibling node; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more siblings, or if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至下一個同層級節點，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果沒有其他的同層級節點，或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 目前位在屬性節點上，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至下一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next attribute; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至下一個屬性，則傳回 <see langword="true" />；如果沒有其他屬性，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an attribute, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不目前所在的屬性，這個方法會傳回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不會變更。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> methods are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>屬性，方法位於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>方法都不適用。

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法一律會傳回`false`，不會變更的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位在屬性上，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>移至擁有者項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> methods to display all the attributes for each book in the `books.xml` file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>通訊錄的每個顯示的所有屬性的方法`books.xml`檔案。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input.
trans-unit.target: 範例將 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至下一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至下一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next namespace node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至下一個命名空間節點，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 類別會以反向的文件順序傳回命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> essentially moves to the namespace node above the one in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>實際上會移至目前範圍中的一個以上的命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on a namespace node, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不目前所在的命名空間節點，這個方法會傳回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不會變更。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>命名空間節點，方法位於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不適用。

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法一律會傳回`false`，不會變更的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於命名空間節點上，呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>將移回至項目節點。

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 如需定義的命名空間節點，請參閱 W3C XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 之建議事項的 5.4 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> value describing the namespace scope.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> 值，說明命名空間的範圍。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the next namespace node matching the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至符合指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope" /> 的下一個命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the next namespace node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至下一個命名空間節點，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 類別會以反向的文件順序傳回命名空間節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on a namespace node, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不目前所在的命名空間節點，這個方法會傳回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不會變更。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>命名空間節點，方法位於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不適用。

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法一律會傳回`false`，不會變更的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位於命名空間節點上，呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>將移回至項目節點。

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 如需定義的命名空間節點，請參閱 W3C XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 之建議事項的 5.4 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the parent node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 移至目前節點的父節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is successful moving to the parent node of the current node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 成功移至目前節點的父節點，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="false" />，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 的位置就不會變更。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the parent node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>方法取決於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>目前的節點，而<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>移至父節點。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes, and the parent nodes they can move to.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> to the previous sibling node of the current node.
